addFaq.title: Submit Your Question !!
addFaq.question: Question
addFaq.pcHint1: Questions should be clear and specific
addFaq.pcHint3: Higher priority questions (4-5) are for urgent matters
addFaq.pcHint4: Images should be relevant to the question
addFaq.pcHint5: Voice recordings should be clear and concise
addFaq.textPlaceholder: Describe your question in detail minimum 10 characters
addFaq.priorityHint1: priority (5) are for urgent matters and should be answered within 1 day
addFaq.priorityHint2: priority (4) are for non-urgent matters and should be answered within 2 days
addFaq.priorityHint3: priority (3) are for non-urgent matters and should be answered within 3 days
addFaq.priorityHint4: priority (2) are for non-urgent matters and should be answered within 4 days
addFaq.priorityHint5: priority (1) are for non-urgent matters and should be answered within 5 days
addFaq.priorityHint6: Replays Will in working days  days off not include
addFaq.imagePlaceholder: Attach images relevant to your question (minimum 1 image) maximum 5 images allowed Or click to select
addFaq.imageHint1: Images should be relevant to the question
addFaq.imageHint2: You can attach a minimum of 1 image and a maximum of 5 images. Make sure to select images that best illustrate your inquiry.
addFaq.imageHint3: Use high-quality images that are clear and easy to understand. Blurry or unclear images may hinder the response process.
addFaq.imageHint4: Check that your images are in an acceptable format (e.g., JPEG, PNG) to avoid submission issues
addFaq.imageHint5: If any submitted images violate our content policies, your account may be deactivated. This includes images that are inappropriate, irrelevant, or do not adhere to the guidelines set forth by the system.
addFaq.voicePlaceholder: Attach voice recording relevant to your question (minimum 1 voice recording)
addFaq.voiceHint1: Ensure your voice recordings are clear and easy to understand. Speak at a moderate pace and articulate your words to enhance comprehension.
addFaq.voiceHint2: Keep your recordings brief and to the point. Aim to convey your message within the maximum length of 1 minute to maintain focus and clarity.
addFaq.voiceHint3: Record in a quiet environment to minimize background noise. This will help ensure that your voice is the primary focus of the recording.
addFaq.voiceHint4: Maintain an appropriate distance from the microphone. This helps capture your voice clearly without distortion or excessive volume fluctuations.
addFaq.voiceHint5: Make sure your voice recording is directly related to your question. This will provide additional context and assist in a quicker response from the support team.
addFaq.confirmation: Are you sure you want to submit this question? Once submitted, it cannot be edited or deleted. You will be redirected to the dashboard to view your submitted question. and will deducted from your current balance
addFaq.success: Your question has been submitted successfully
addFaq.successDesc: We will get back to you soon
addFaq.questionlength: Question must be at least 10 characters long
addFaq.hasSpecialCharsOnly: Question cannot contain only special characters
addFaq.maxImageAllowed: You can only upload up to
addFaq.dragDrop: Drag and drop or click to select
addFaq.upgradePlanPrompt: Your balance is running low. Consider upgrading to our Pro plan for unlimited questions!
addFaq.insufficientBalance: Insufficient balance. Please upgrade your plan.

workSample.pageDescription: We are always working on the customer's work, which represents our work.
workSample.pagetitle: At Dream to App, we specialize in delivering exceptional web and mobile solutions tailored to your unique needs. Our skilled team combines cutting-edge technology with innovative design and visual identity to create user-friendly applications that enhance both functionality and user experience. We prioritize UI/UX principles to ensure every interaction is intuitive and engaging. With a strong commitment to quality and professionalism, we execute each project with efficiency and attention to detail. Partner with Dream to App to experience the difference that true expertise can make in your digital journey.

willdo.UiDetail: Our professional team designs innovative and engaging websites that professionally reflect your brand identity.
willdo.UxDetail: We pay close attention to user experience details to ensure an easy and seamless experience for visitors to your website.
willdo.perfomanceTitle: We guarantee that your website works quickly and efficiently on all devices and screens.
willdo.seoTitle: We use best practices to improve your website's search engine optimization and increase its visibility in search results.

provide.helpTitle: We provide you with continuous technical support to help solve any issues you may encounter and ensure your website continues to work perfectly.
provide.freeConsultaionTitle: I'm happy to provide free consultations in the field of website design, programming, or mobile applications, and to work with you to find the right solutions for your business.

tcno.nextjsTitle: A powerful framework for building server-rendered React applications, enabling fast and optimized web apps.
tcno.nodejsTitle: A JavaScript runtime that allows for building scalable network applications, perfect for backend services.
tcno.reactTitle: A popular JavaScript library for creating interactive user interfaces with reusable components.
tcno.reactnativeTitle: A framework for building mobile applications using React, enabling native apps for iOS and Android.
tcno.mongoDBTitle: A NoSQL database that stores data in flexible, JSON-like documents, designed for scalability.
tcno.firebaseTitle: A platform by Google for building mobile and web apps, offering tools for real-time databases and authentication.
tcno.awsTitle: A comprehensive cloud computing platform that provides a wide range of services for hosting applications.
tcno.prismaTitle: An open-source database toolkit that simplifies database access for Node.js applications.
